info.title: Employment Domain
info.description: The Employment Domain deals with all data regarding the employment of the employees of theemployment agency. This includes the management of the employees, their contracts, and theirworking hours. (Note that 'employees' should not be confused with the management employees at the employment agency, which are managed in the Users Domain.)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the candidate employee

schema.description: Please refer to the [JSON Patch](https://jsonpatch.com/) documentation for more details.

get.summary: Gets all document types that are available for employee documents.
Retrieve a recruitment location by its id.
Retrieve trait element for given id
Retrieve trait group for given id
Retrieve a profile for given vacancy

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset from the start of the list, defaults to 0. Minimum value is 0.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of vacancies to return; defaults to 100; min 1; max 1000.

parameters.name: changesSince
parameters.description:
An optional datetime to be passed along. When passed, only items that have been changed since the given datetime are returned. The time should be passed as UTC.

Required dateformat: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss

get.summary: If a vacancy exists for vacancyId, returns an OK 200 response with a Data.Employment.Grpc.Interface.Dto.VacancyLinkedCandidate object.
Retrieve all traits for given vacancy

id.description: The Plan4Flex primary key Id of the database entity

candidateId.description: The id of the linked candidate

inNameOf.description: In name of. The holder/owner of the bank account

countryId.description: The id of the linked country.

startDate.description: the date of the start of the bank account

endDate.description: the end of the bank account.

id.description: The Plan4Flex primary key Id of the database entity

candidateId.description: The unique identifier of the candidate the education belongs to.

institutionName.description: The name of the institute of the education

city.description: The name of the city of the institute of the education

countryId.description: The country of the institute of the education

startYear.description: The start year of the education

endYear.description: The end year of the education

hasAchievedDiploma.description: Indicator for achieving a diploma for this education

id.description: The Plan4Flex primary key Id of the database entity

CandidateEmployeeStatus.description: The status of an candidate employee

id.description: The Plan4Flex primary key Id of the database entity

candidateId.description: The unique identifier of the candidate the trait belongs to.

traitElementId.description: The unique identifier of the element of the trait.

traitValueId.description: The unique identifier of the value of the trait.

id.description: The Plan4Flex primary key Id of the database entity

candidateId.description: The id of the linked candidate where this work experience is from.

organizationName.description: The name of the organization where the work experience is gained.

city.description: The city/place where the work experience is gained.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the organization where this work experience is gained.

CandidateEmployeeWorkExperience.description: The work experience of a candidate employee.

id.description: The unique identifier of the contract.

ouId.description: The unique identifier of the organization unit the contract belongs to.

startOfContract.description: The date of the start of the contract period

endOfContract.description: The nullable date of the end of the contract period. When the contract is indefinite, this is null.

archived.description: Geeft aan of het contracttype gearchiveerd is en niet meer aan contracten mag worden toegekend

hoursWeekly.description: Het default aantal uren per week voor contracten van dit type

hourlyRate.description: Het default uurloon voor contracten van dit type

contractDuration.description: De default contractduur voor contracten van dit type

contractPeriodeUnit.description: De eenheid waarin de default contractduur wordt uitgedrukt (1=dag, 2=week, 3=maand, 4=jaar, 5=onbepaalde tijd)

automaticallyTransferReservations.description: Reserveringen automatisch overhevelen na einde plaatsing

fileName.description: The name of the file. This should not be empty, and include a file extension.

entityId.description:
The id of the entity this document belongs to. This can be an employee, a branch, etc. depending on the endpoint
used to create the document.

documentTypeId.description: The ID of the document type

createdDate.description: The date the document was created. If null, the current date will be used.

expirationDate.description: The date the document expires. If null, the document will not expire.

description.description: An optional description of the document

isPublic.description:
Whether the document is public. If true, the document can be viewed by employees. If false, the document can only
be viewed by the employment agency. If not set, the default value of the document type will be used.

data.description: The binary data of the document file.

CreateCandidateEmployeeDocument.description: DTO for creating an candidate employee document

fileName.description: The name of the file. This should not be empty, and include a file extension.

entityId.description:
The id of the entity this document belongs to. This can be an employee, a branch, etc. depending on the endpoint
used to create the document.

documentTypeId.description: The ID of the document type

createdDate.description: The date the document was created. If null, the current date will be used.

expirationDate.description: The date the document expires. If null, the document will not expire.

description.description: An optional description of the document

isPublic.description:
Whether the document is public. If true, the document can be viewed by employees. If false, the document can only
be viewed by the employment agency. If not set, the default value of the document type will be used.

data.description: The binary data of the document file.

CreateEmployeeDocument.description: DTO for creating an employee document

id.description: The unique identifier of the document type

name.description: A descriptive name of the document type

archived.description: Whether or not the document type is archived. When it is archived, it should not be used anymore for new documents

defaultPublic.description:
Whether or not the document type is public by default. When it is public by default, new documents with this
type will be public by default.

id.description: The Plan4Flex primary key Id of the database entity

employeeId.description: The primary key Id of the employee.

startDate.description: The (inclusive) date on which the availability starts.

endDate.description: The (inclusive) date on which the availability ends. If this is null, the availability does not have an end date.

ouId.description: The organization unit Id of the availability.

salaryNumber.description: The optional salary number of the availability.

importId.description: The optional import Id of the availability.

endReasonId.description: The optional primary key Id to the end reason of the availability.

endRemark.description: An optional remark for the end of the availability.

EmployeeAvailability.description:
A DTO for the availability of an employee.
This DTO indicates a link between an employee and an organization unit, with a start and end date. This DTO is the
root of many Plan4Flex entities that are related to an employee, such as most planning entities, contracts, etc.

id.description: The Plan4Flex primary key Id of the database entity

employeeId.description: The primary key Id of the employee.

startDate.description: The (inclusive) start date from which the bank account is valid.

endDate.description: The (inclusive) end date until which the bank account is valid.

inNameOf.description: The name in which the bank account is registered.

inNameOfLocation.description: The location in which the bank account is registered.

countryId.description: P4F Id of the country in which the bank account is registered.

importId.description: Additional import identifier for third party integrations.

isSalaryAccount.description: Whether the bank account is used for salary payments.

EmployeeBankAccount.description: A DTO for an employee bank account.

id.description: The Plan4Flex primary key Id of the database entity

employeeId.description: The primary key Id of the employee.

startDate.description: The (inclusive) start date from which the bank account is valid.

endDate.description: The (inclusive) end date until which the bank account is valid.

comment.description: The optional comment for this income guarantee.

id.description: The unique identifier of the CandidateEmployee.

initials.description: The initials of the name of the candidate employee.

lastName.description: The last name of the candidate employee.

namePrefix.description: An optional prefix for the last name of the candidate employee, for example "van der".

firstName.description: The first name of the candidate employee.

birthName.description: The name the candidate employee was born with.

birthNamePrefix.description: The prefix of the birth name of the candidate employee, for example "van der".

nickname.description: The name that should be used when addressing the candidate employee.

dateOfBirth.description: The date the candidate employee was born.

cityOfBirth.description: The city or town the candidate employee was born in.

countryOfBirthId.description: The id to the country the candidate employee was born in.

genderId.description: The id of the gender of the candidate employee.

maritalStatusId.description: The id to the current marital status of the candidate employee.

healthInsurerId.description: The id to the health insurer of the candidate employee.

healthInsuranceNumber.description: The number the candidate employee is insured with at their health insurer.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the candidate employee.

mobileNumber.description: The mobile phone number of the candidate employee.

communicationLanguageId.description: The preferred language the candidate employee should be communicated with.

generalPractitionerId.description: The id of the general practitioner of the candidate employee.

personalHousing.description: Whether or not the candidate employee has their own residence within the Netherlands.

comment.description: An optional comment about the candidate employee.

statusId.description: The id to the current status of the candidate employee, for example "active", "inactive", or "candidate".

recruiterId.description: The id to the recruiter that recruited the candidate employee.

idDocumentNumber.description: The registration number of the identification document (identificationnumber)

idDocumentTypeId.description: The P4F identifier to the kind of identity document the candidate employee uses to identify themselves.

idDocumentValidUntil.description: The inclusive end date for the employee's Identification document.

hasDriversLicense.description: Whether or not the candidate employee has a drivers license.

driversLicenseValidUntil.description: The date the drivers license of the candidate employee expires.

nationalityId.description: The id to the primary nationality the candidate employee has.

fiscalResidenceId.description: The id to the country where the candidate employee is taxed.
